metadata.Plot: In the English countryside, young woman Mary Viner has an opportunity to marry Arnold Furze, the hard working but lonely owner of the oddly named Doomsday Farm. He sacrifices a treasured stand of old trees to afford to bring the farm up-to-date for her, but when she considers the hard work she'll do, marries the rich but otherwise inadequate local banker, to her regret.
metadata.Writer: Doris Anderson, Warwick Deeping, Julian Johnson
metadata.Actors: Florence Vidor, Gary Cooper, Lawrence Grant
